title: Bug 14047StyledText  inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: build 20020416Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of theentire client area. This should at a maximum only be one redraw for eachvisible line.Run the test case below to reproduce. Add the following line toStyledTextperformPaint to see the redraws occurring:System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ",renderHeight " + renderHeight);
